source_objects.title: Arts & Crafts
source_objects.description: From quilting to cake decorating, crafting inspiration to art instruction, welcome to the ultimate place for courses in arts & crafts.

items.title: How to Draw Like a Master. Drawing a Hand.
items.headline: The Step-by-Step Comprehensive Guide
objectives_summary: Draw amazing lifelike hands

items.title: Autumn Watercolor Painting - Fall Birch Trees Easy Beginner
items.headline: Bring Out Your Inner Artist - Learn to paint this fall scene with birch trees.
objectives_summary: Understand the supplies you need for a basic watercolor painting.
How to prep your paper and paints.
Create a fall scene with birch trees.

items.title: How to Draw Cute Kawaii Dinosaurs Cartoon Drawing Animation
items.headline: Course: How to Draw Cute Dinosaurs for Beginners Step by Step
objectives_summary: How to Draw Cute Dinosaurs
How to Draw Cute Kawaii Dinosaurs
How to Draw Dinosaurs

items.title: Project- Learn to Paint  this Lupine Watercolor Painting
items.headline: Simple, Easy, Watercolor painting scene you can do at your own pace step by step in real time.
objectives_summary: Complete the Lupine Scene step by step. Learn to Sketch, use a light color wash, and add fine details on a seascape watercolor painting.
Creative Fun and enjoyment of watercolors
Learn what materials to use for basic watercolor

items.title: Drawing Cartoons - How To Draw Cute Cartoon Animal Faces
items.headline: Drawing for kids - Drawing classes for cartoon lovers and kids with simple effective pencil drawing cute animals
objectives_summary: Draw cute cartoon animal faces with expressions
Use drawing methods to other cartoon characters also
Apply shading to their cartoon characters

items.title: Drawing for Kids: Colored Pencil & Watercolor Painting Art

items.headline: Drawing & Painting for Kids & Children. Pencil Drawing, Wathercolor Painting. various Art Skills for Kids & Beginners.
objectives_summary: In this course, children will become familiar with shapes and can draw a variety of fruits, cup shapes, dishes, and a variety of foods, as well as ice creams

items.title: French Cursive Calligraphy Masterclass
items.headline: Traditional pen-and-ink calligraphy using a broad nib that will take you on a (virtual) Tour of France
objectives_summary: Write beautifully in the French Cursive style.
Your mind and spirit will also benefit from this calming activity.

items.title: Make it with Clay!

visible_instructors.name: Anne Goodrich
visible_instructors.job_title: Professional Artist and Teacher, Owner of Tumalo Art Farm
visible_instructors.title: Anne Goodrich Hunter

items.headline: A Blow by Blow Guide to Foundational Ceramics Skills
objectives_summary: We'll start making pottery with basic pinch pots but then we'll learn a number of ways to transform those into cups, bowls and a variety of sculptures. Then we'll move on to other ceramic methods like coil, slab and glazing methods.

items.title: Improve ALL your watercolor techniques by  painting this.

visible_instructors.name: Nicola A
visible_instructors.job_title: Professional Artist, Teacher and Creative Entrepreneur
visible_instructors.title: Nicola A Blakemore

items.headline: A superb painting to learn how to create your own composition from a photo. Really understand color values light & shade
objectives_summary: How to successfully convert a photograph into a painting.
How to adjust a composition to suit you.
How to create excellent light and shade in a woodland scene.

items.title: 3D Printing Through To Painting
items.headline: Learn the process to go from filament to a display piece to get professional level final results
objectives_summary: 3D printing
How to use slicer software
Post Processing

items.title: DIY Leathercrafting: Make your own Leather Bag in 2 hours
items.headline: Complete Leather Crafting Course: From Zero to Hero. Learn to make original Leather Bag from an experienced Master
objectives_summary: Learn to make original Leather Bags without machine stitching
Understand the specifics of leather and leathercrafting

items.title: Paint Realistic Watercolor Portraits
items.headline: Master the techniques of realistic watercolor portrait painting.
objectives_summary: How to Draw and Paint Realistic Portraits in Watercolor.
Basic, Intermediate, and Advanced Watercolor Techniques
How to Choose and Edit a Good Portrait Reference

items.title: Get started in animation | From an idea to an animated movie
items.headline: Your online guide to making fun animation movies
objectives_summary: How to create an animation movie.
How to animate an object.
How to create a clay character.

items.title: Watercolor Poppies | Buds To Flowers
items.headline: Summer Poppies - painting watercolor buds to flowers - For Beginners and up!
objectives_summary: Create a simple Color chart with red and orange and test out amounts of water and blending.
Learn to expand on those colors by adding a Glaze to create more shades and depth.
Paint a simple quick poppy shape for practice.

items.title: The Art Of Creativity
items.headline: A Journy of  Creative Exploration Through Watercolour
objectives_summary: Learn how develop your own style and  connect to the creative flow

items.title: Sewing Essentials
items.headline: This extensive sewing course will help provide all of the essentials to get your started.
objectives_summary: This sewing course provides the skills and techniques needed to get your started in this great hobby.
Review of important sewing machine components.
Choosing the right needles & thread, fabric choices and cutting tools.
